long_description: A great choice for alpine climbing, mountaineering and skiing trips, the low-profile Mountain Hardwear Dome Ruinart hat fits easily under hoods and helmets to keep your head warm. Body features AirShield(TM) microfleece fabric for reliable windproof protection and a high warmth-to-weight ratio. Tecnostretch(R) fabric (93% polyester/7% elastane) cutouts located at the ears don't inhibit hearing as much as the windproof fleece fabric would. Stretch fleece back panel enhances the fit of the Mountain Hardwear Dome Ruinart hat.
short_description: A great choice for alpine climbing, mountaineering and skiing trips, the low-profile Mountain Hardwear Dome Ruinart hat fits easily under hoods and helmets to keep your head warm.
